property.name: designTimeData
property.description: Gets or sets the DesignTimeData option.

property.name: data
property.description: Gets or sets the data option.

property.name: archiveName
property.description: Required property. The series obtains its data from the VisiWin system module Trends. For this purpose, the name of an archive definition is specified via the ArchiveName property.

property.name: trendName
property.description: Required property. The series obtains its data from the VisiWin system module Trends. The TrendName property sets the name of a trend definition within the archive.

property.name: showLine
property.description: Specifies whether the line is drawn.

property.name: lineFill
property.description: Specifies whether the area below the line is filled with the LineFillColor.

property.name: lineFillColor
property.description: Specifies the LineFillColor for the area below the line.

property.name: showAxis
property.description: Specifies whether the Y-Axis should be displayed.

property.name: position
property.description: Specifies the Position of the Y-axis(Left/Right).

property.name: rawLimitMin
property.description: Specifies the maximum value of the Y-axis.

property.name: rawLimitMax
property.description: Specifies the minimum value of the Y-axis.

property.name: labelWidth
property.description: Specifies the width of the Y-axis.

property.name: yaxisColor
property.description: Specifies the color of the Y-axis.

property.name: tickLength
property.description: Specifies the length of the scale tick.

property.name: tickDecimals
property.description: Specifies the decimals of the scale ticks.
